name: ch-api-client-typescript
description: Openapi generated typescript-axios client for CloudHospital

scripts.build: openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 4.3.1 && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -o src -i https://api-int.icloudhospital.com/swagger/v1/swagger.json --type-mappings=DateTime=Date && tsc

author: hyounoosung@gmail.com
